document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Ilzimmer Villa on Shark Street.
document_data.name: Ilzimmer Villa
document_data.location: [[Shark Street]] & [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]], [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Ilzimmer Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Ilzimmer]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the southwest corner where [[Shark Street]] intersected the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained three separate buildings and a large garden. Each building stood one or two stories tall.
